blogPost.excerpt: Pulse is a private, 27,000+ verified member community for technology leaders to learn from their peers. Members can ask questions, create polls, and engage in conversations for instant insights. Over 16,000+ new data points are gathered each week in Pulse.
blogPost.body: Pulse is a private, 27,000+ verified member community for technology leaders to learn from their peers. Members can ask questions, create polls, and engage in conversations for instant insights. Over 16,000+ new data points are gathered each week in Pulse.
blogPost.title: Pulse - A community for technology leaders to learn from each other
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Pulse是一个私人的、超过27,000名经过验证的会员社区，供技术领导者向同行学习。会员可以提出问题，创建投票，并参与对话以获得即时见解。Pulse每周收集超过16,000+个新数据点。
localize.tagline: 技术领导者相互学习的社区

localize.description: Pulse是一個私人的、超過27,000名經過驗證的會員社區，供技術領導者向同行學習。會員可以提出問題，創建投票，並參與對話以獲得即時見解。Pulse每週收集超過16,000+個新數據點。
localize.tagline: 技術領導者相互學習的社區

previous.excerpt: Snapblooms is an ecommerce platform for ordering floral bouquets. With over 500+ florists already using our cloud solution Hana Florist POS, this is our attempt to bring customers close to flower shops and provide high quality, farm-fresh flowers.
previous.title: Snapblooms - Flowers with a difference  🌼

localize.description: Snapblooms是一个订购花束的电子商务平台。目前已经有超过500家花店在使用我们的云端解决方案Hana Florist POS，这是我们的尝试，让顾客接近花店，提供高品质的农场新鲜鲜花。
Snapblooms是一個訂購花束的電子商務平臺。目前已經有超過500家花店在使用我們的雲端解決方案Hana Florist POS，這是我們的嘗試，讓顧客接近花店，提供高品質的農場新鮮鮮花。

next.excerpt: Shoutout makes it incredibly easy to tap into your existing social proof and turn it into a beautiful "Wall of Love". Capture, curate, and publish a wall in less than 3 minutes 💯
next.title: Shoutout - Attract more customers by highlighting why people trust you

localize.description: Shoutout让你非常容易地挖掘现有的社交证明，并将其变成美丽的 "爱之墙"。在不到3分钟的时间内捕捉、策划和发布一面墙 💯。
localize.tagline: 通过强调人们信任你的原因来吸引更多的客户。

localize.description: Shoutout讓你非常容易地挖掘現有的社交證明，並將其變成美麗的 "愛之牆"。在不到3分鐘的時間內捕捉、策劃和發佈一面牆 💯。
localize.tagline: 通過強調人們信任你的原因來吸引更多的客戶。
